template_data.title: Other continents
template_data.content: In addition to [[Faerûn]], other continents on the planet [[Abeir-Toril]] have been populated.

document_data.title: Other continents
document_data.content: In addition to [[Faerûn]], other continents on the planet [[Abeir-Toril]] have been populated.
document_data.mainbody:
[[Kara-Tur]] : The oriental continent to the east of Faerûn.
; [[Maztica]] : A "new world" setting on a continent far to the west of Faerûn.  The [[Spellplague]] transported Maztica to [[Abeir]].
; [[Laerakond]] : A continent from Abeir that appeared in the location formerly occupied by Maztica after the Spellplague.
; [[Zakhara]] : South of Faerûn, an arabian-inspired continent detailed in the [[Al-Qadim]] setting.}}
[[Category:Content portals]]
